Detailed Description

A connection between two adjacent times.

Member Function Documentation

int Portal::direction (  ) 

Returns 1 if this portal leads forward in time, -1 otherwise

When a unit performs a warp action, this value is added to the unit's z coordinate.

int Portal::fee (  ) 

Returns the price in gold that you will pay if a unit warps through this portal.

int Portal::feeIncr (  ) 

Returns the amount the fee will increase every time a unit uses this portal.

float Portal::feeMultiplier (  ) 

Returns the value multiplied to the portal fee at the end of each turn.
